document.full_text: rising rates of multi-drug resistant tuberculosis (tb) are hampering world health programs aimed at tackling tb and threaten to wipe out progress made against the disease, scientists said on friday.
document.title: drug resistance hampers fight against tuberculosis
lines_and_colors: rising rates of multi-drug resistant tuberculosis (tb) are hampering world health programs aimed at tackling tb and threaten to wipe out progress made against the disease, scientists said on friday.
